Doreen Ruth Amule, onye a maara dị ka Doreen Aumule, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwụ na-anọchite anya mpaghara ụmụ nwanyị nke Amolatar, kemgbe 2017. Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ịwu ndị omeiwu na-ese okwu iji wepụ afọ ole onye isi ala Ugandan, dịka edepụtara na Iwu Ugandan nke 1995.
A mụrụ ya na Amolatar District, na 28 Ọktoba 1882. Ọ gara Masindi Secondary School n'etiịịafọ 1998 na 2001, maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na Wanale View Secondary School, na Mbale, maka agụm akwụkwọ A-Level ya, site na 2002 ruo 2003.
N'afọ 2004, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Islam dị na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2007 na Bachelors na Human Resource Management
N'afọ 2010, ọ gara Law Development Centre na Kampala, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na asambodo na Iwu Nchịkwa
Ka e mesịrị, na 2014, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Business Administration na Mahadum Nkumba
N'afọ 2008, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Naịl na ogige Arua, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 2009.
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Gọọmentị Obodo Amolatar District
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Women Caucus na Amolatar District, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ n'afọ 2016

N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Network for Locally Elected Women of Africa (REFELA), na dịka onye isi oche of the Ethics and Accountability Committee of the Uganda Local Government Association
Site na 2011 ruo 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Amolatar District Local Council.
N'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere oche ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara ụmụ nwanyị nke Amolatar District
Ọ gbara ọsọ na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement na-achị
Ọ meriri ma bụrụ onye nọ n'ọkwa.
